thread.title: Watch the Full Lady Gaga Super Bowl LI Halftime Performance
thread.title_full: Watch the Full Lady Gaga Super Bowl LI Halftime Performance

title: Watch the Full Lady Gaga Super Bowl LI Halftime Performance
text:
Lady G. Photo: Larry Busacca/Getty Images Lady Gaga opened tonight’s Super Bowl Halftime show with a medley of the classics “God Bless America” and “This Land is Your Land,” but don’t worry, she was wearing some sort of shoulder-padded-sparkling bathing suit thing that only Mother Monster could pull off. After that tear-jerking opener, Gaga jumped off the roof . No, really. “America, world, how you doing tonight? We’re here to make you feel good. You wanna feel good with us?” she asked the crowd. They did! They did want to feel good with her. You can hear it. Check out the full video below, which includes “Poker Face,” “Born This Way” and “Telephone” all done in a very Super Bowl-y way. 

WOW. Amazing. @ladygaga 's #PepsiHalftime Show! 👏 #SB51 https://t.co/z9vCKRBKkC 
— NFL (@NFL) February 6, 2017 Tags: lady gaga super bowl li halftime show   Top Stories WATCH: Stranger Things Just Dropped a New Teaser at the Super Bowl Watch the Full Lady Gaga Halftime Performance Watch Lady Gaga Dive Into Super Bowl LI Most Viewed Stories Someone   Every Super Bowl Halftime Show Since 1993, Ranked from Worst to Best It’s Bustin’ Time in the First Look at Stranger Things Season Two Kristen Stewart Drops a Live F-Bomb, Mocks Donald Trump, and Announces That She’s ‘So Gay, Dude’ in Grand Trifecta SNL Monologue What’s New on Netflix: February 2017 What to Stream Now See what's new and notable on Netflix, Amazon, Hulu, and HBO Yes, Kate Beckinsale Is ‘Very Proud’ of Her ‘Granddaughter’ (And Ex-Husband’s Girlfriend) Sarah Silverman, Thank You for Asking Investigation Concludes A Dog’s Purpose Viral Animal-Abuse Video Was ‘Manipulated’ Saturday Night Live Recap: Kristen Stewart Drops an F-Bomb, Taunts Donald Trump Chelsea   Patton Oswalt Shares His Wife’s Cause of Death   Vulture Mark Hamill Can't Believe The Prequel Bashing Latest News from Vulture 23 mins ago WATCH: Stranger Things Just Dropped a New Teaser at the Super Bowl Scary. Again.
